name: Divyam Amla Candy
desc: Sweetened naturally with jaggery, retains essential minerals like iron, magnesium, and potassium.

name: Divyam Amla Juice
desc: Amla juice is rich in vitamin C and antioxidants, boosting immunity and promoting healthy skin.

name: Divyam Amla Pickle
desc: Amla pickle is a tangy and spicy condiment that enhances the flavor of meals while providing health benefits.

name: Divyam Amla Murabba
desc: Amla murabba is a sweet preserve made from amla, rich in vitamin C and antioxidants, promoting overall health.

name: Divyam Amla Candy Sugar Free
desc: Sugar-free amla candy offers the health benefits of amla without added sugars, making it suitable for diabetics.
